Author: BreckenFoster
EnhancedContent: win11 22h2, after sleep mode, the screen lights up when I move the mouse, which is not very convenient. I have tried removing the mouse from the device manager, but it did not work.
Title: How to disable mouse wake-up in Windows 11
Description: win11 22h2, after sleep mode, the screen lights up when I move the mouse, which is not very convenient. I have tried removing the mouse from the device manager, but it did not work.
